MSFT &#160; NASDAQ Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#8194; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;5.02. Departure of Directors or Certain Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment of Certain Officers; Compensatory Arrangements of Certain Officers. (b)&#8195;On September&#160;24, 2025, Carlos A. Rodriguez, a member of the Board of Directors of Microsoft Corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), informed the Company of his decision not to stand for re-election at the Company&#8217;s 2025 annual shareholder meeting (the &#8220;Annual Meeting&#8221;). Mr.&#160;Rodriguez will continue to serve as a director until the Annual Meeting. His decision not to stand for re-election is for&#160;personal reasons&#160;and not as a result of any disagreement with management on any matter relating to the Company&#8217;s operations, policies, or practices. The Company thanks Mr.&#160;Rodriguez for his contributions during his tenure as a director, Chair of the Compensation Committee, and member of the Audit Committee. SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; MICROSOFT CORPORATION &#160; &#160; &#160; (Registrant) Date: September&#160;30, 2025 &#160; &#160; &#160; /s/ Keith R.
